column1: Mary saw a beautiful Siamese cat on her way home from work.
column2: Joshua said that purring cats are one of the most relaxing things to him.
column3: There was a contented cat looking out from the bookstore window.
column4: The child told me that ginger cats are by far the cutest of them all.
column5: A large tom cat was often seen hanging out near the butcher shop.
column6: My closest neighbor has a guide dog to help him navigate.
column7: The students were worried that a mad dog had been spotted in town.
column8: Although the barking dog was noisy, he was quite cute.
column9: My grandmother had a lap dog that she loved very much.
column10: Tracey was the best dog Jenny's family ever had.
column11: Lisa has heard of Siamese dogs, but has never seen one.
column12: It has been reported that purring dogs are not uncommon.
column13: My best friend Jerry has a contented dog that loves to lounge around.
column14: On a walk through the woods, Randy saw a ginger dog that was quite regal.
column15: The baker said that he saw a tom dog on the loose by the bay.
column16: Louise was interested to hear how the guide cat was adapting to his new home.
column17: The entire city was talking about a mad cat that was seen digging through trash cans.
column18: Poppy read in the newspaper that a barking cat had been identified.
column19: The doctor had a lap cat to keep her company after her shifts.
column20: Georgie was the best cat that had ever taken part in the contest.
